entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:51PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels Continue on the Tanana River... The Tanana River continues to run near bankfull at some locations between Tok and Manley Hot Springs. Water levels on the Tanana River are expected to fall slowly over the next couple of days, but additional heavy rainfall in the central and eastern Interior, and Alaska Range through Monday
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:51PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...More Heavy Rain in the Alaska Range... Another moisture laden weather system will move across the Interior and Alaska Range tonight and Sunday with rainfall amounts of 0.50 to 2.0 inches. Additional rainfall is expected through mid week with 1 to 2 inches Tuesday into Wednesday. Heaviest rainfall will be south of Kantishna and Healy in Denali

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:07PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: Widespread rain is expected to continue across Southcentral Alaska through the end of the weekend as a series of storm systems move across the region. The first storm system moved through overnight and this morning bringing heavy rain to the area with the greatest amounts seen across the Western Susitna Valley, where over 2.5" has already fallen. A second storm system is then expected to bring another round of moderate to heavy rain across the western Kenai Peninsula,
entry.cap:areaDesc: Anchorage; Matanuska Valley; Susitna Valley; Western Kenai Peninsula; Western Prince William Sound

entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:29PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR GILA COUNTY WILL EXPIRE AT 430 PM MST... The storm which prompted the warning has weakened below severe limits, and no longer poses an immediate threat to life or property. Therefore, the warning will be allowed to expire. However small hail and gusty winds are still possible with this thunderstorm.
